interviews with the Mars Volta, At the Drive-In, and related bands

this is a work-in-progress.

helping out

thinking of lending a helping hand? please feel free to contact me.

here's a list of some (but not all) of the ways you might be able to help:

  • sharing anything that's not currently on this website
  • searching for interviews
  • searching for interviews in other languages
  • digitizing interviews from magazines

if you'd prefer to help out with money, then consider donating to archive.org. without the Internet Archive, this project would be way less complete.
